title: Enhance Service Interface JSDoc Documentation
description: Add comprehensive JSDoc comments to all service interface methods with complete parameter descriptions, return types, error conditions, and usage examples

content_requirements: Return value documentation with success/error scenarios

validation_criteria.example_coverage: All public methods have usage examples
review_checklist: All parameters documented with types and descriptions
Error conditions enumerated with specific error types

template.method_documentation:
/**
 * Brief description of what the method does
 * 
 * @param paramName - Description of parameter including constraints
 * @param optionalParam - Optional parameter description with default behavior
 * @returns Promise<Type> - Description of successful return value
 * @throws {SpecificErrorType} When specific condition occurs
 * @throws {AnotherErrorType} When another condition occurs
 * 
 * @example
 * ```typescript
 * const result = await service.methodName('example', { option: true });
 * console.log(result); // Expected output
 * ```
 * 
 * @see {@link RelatedInterface} for related functionality
 * @since version when method was added
 */
template.interface_documentation:
/**
 * Brief description of the interface purpose and responsibilities
 * 
 * This interface defines the contract for [specific functionality].
 * Implementations must handle [specific requirements].
 * 
 * @template T - Generic type parameter description if applicable
 * 
 * @example
 * ```typescript
 * class MyService implements IServiceInterface {
 *   async method(): Promise<Result> {
 *     // Implementation
 *   }
 * }
 * ```
 */

title: Complete GeminiService Method Documentation
description: Add missing JSDoc documentation to all public methods in GeminiService with focus on AI integration patterns, error handling, and rate limiting

specific_focus: processMessage method with all parameters and error scenarios
integration_patterns: How to handle rate limiting responses

methods_requiring_documentation: initialize - document initialization sequence and potential failures
processMessage - comprehensive documentation of AI processing flow

validation_criteria.error_scenarios: All error conditions documented with recovery strategies

title: Context Management Architecture Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the context management system including service interactions, data flow, and memory optimization strategies

requirements.data_flow_documentation: How context data flows between services
requirements.api_integration: How context integrates with other services

validation_criteria.performance_documentation: Memory thresholds and optimization strategies explained
validation_criteria.integration_examples: Clear examples of context usage in different scenarios

title: Service Integration Patterns Documentation
description: Document common patterns for service integration, dependency injection, and error handling across the service architecture

requirements.code_examples: Complete working examples for each pattern
requirements.anti_patterns: Common mistakes and how to avoid them

validation_criteria.example_coverage: Working code examples for each pattern

title: Error Handling and Recovery Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for error handling patterns, recovery strategies, and graceful degradation across all services

requirements.error_taxonomy: Classification of all error types and scenarios
requirements.recovery_strategies: Documented recovery patterns for each error type
requirements.monitoring_integration: How errors integrate with health monitoring
requirements.user_experience: How errors are presented to users

error_scenarios_to_document: Gemini API failures and rate limiting

title: Code Comment Standardization and Enhancement
description: Standardize inline code comments across the codebase, focusing on complex algorithms and business logic explanation

requirements.complex_algorithms: Detailed explanation of algorithm logic and design decisions
requirements.business_logic: Clear explanation of business rules and decision criteria

comment_standards.inline_comments: // Explain why this approach was chosen, not what the code does
comment_standards.block_comments: /* Multi-line explanation of complex logic or algorithm */
comment_standards.decision_rationale: // Decision: chose X over Y because...
comment_standards.business_rules: // Business rule: users can only be roasted once per...

title: API Usage Examples and Integration Guide
description: Create comprehensive usage examples and integration guide for external developers and service consumers

requirements.complete_examples: End-to-end examples for common use cases
requirements.integration_scenarios: Different ways to integrate with the bot services

example_requirements.completeness: Examples that can be run without modification
example_requirements.error_handling: Proper error handling in all examples

validation_criteria.example_testing: All examples are tested and working
validation_criteria.troubleshooting_completeness: Common issues are documented with solutions

title: Configuration and Environment Documentation
description: Document all configuration options, environment variables, and setup procedures with validation requirements

requirements.environment_variables: All environment variables with defaults and validation
requirements.validation_rules: Configuration validation rules and error messages

validation_criteria.usability: Clear setup instructions for new developers

title: Performance and Monitoring Documentation
description: Document performance characteristics, monitoring capabilities, and optimization strategies for all services

requirements.performance_characteristics: Performance metrics and benchmarks for each service
requirements.optimization_strategies: Performance optimization techniques and best practices

validation_criteria.benchmark_accuracy: Performance metrics are measured and accurate

title: Developer Onboarding and Contributing Guide Enhancement
description: Enhance developer onboarding documentation with comprehensive setup guides, coding standards, and contribution workflows

requirements.coding_standards: Comprehensive coding standards and style guide

validation_criteria.setup_completeness: New developers can set up environment following guide
validation_criteria.standards_clarity: Coding standards are clear and enforceable
validation_criteria.workflow_efficiency: Contribution workflow is streamlined and documented
